ygData.subject: RE: Potter site
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for your reply. Seems like somebody must know about how to make deities. Thanks for the info on pricing the vials, sounds like my pricing is about
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for your reply.

Seems like somebody must know about how to make deities.

Thanks for the info on pricing the vials, sounds like my pricing is about
right. Seems like the lined ones are too expensive or their skill isn't
high enough to create a demand.

I do pretty good begging. But still it is a worthless skill. I usually
only get "1 copper", occasionally (maybe 1 out of 100 tries) get 1 silver.
The only difference is that the frequency of getting anything has increased.
And I'm much more confident now to beg "reds", and get money from them as
well. I have never had any faction problems with it. That only happens if
you attack it and they die.

Thanks again!
Tanana - Bristlebane
Master Brewer
Master Potter
Excellent Beggar (soon to be master)


From: "Xillitil of Povar" <xillitil@...>


still never heard anything definite on deities...was rumors a while back
that the cookie cutter sketches were involved, but no luck with anything
tried...
as far as i know, skill maxes at 168 with lined poison vials.
was selling around 1 - 1.5 for normal vials before, but prices may rise a
bit since enchanters will need them too once the new spells work...sold 40
for 2pp each yesterday to one...
think i was asking 2-3 for lined, but not much luck selling them...still got

80 left from maxing my skill...

also how is begging? haven't met too many who have built up that skill...and

have heard rumors of faction problems with it?

Xillitil/Povar
(Master potter,cook,brewer,smith,fletcher, learning jeweler and
tailor...skills are fun :)
